Info

Defines class GenRISCV with attribute(s) and method(s). Loads a base info, creates a CLI interface and run operation(s).

class gen_riscv.GenRISCV(verbose: bool = False)[source]¶

Bases: ATSCli

Defines class GenRISCV with attribute(s) and method(s). Loads base information, creates a CLI interface, and runs operations.

It defines:

attributes:
_GEN_VERBOSE - Console text indicator for process-phase.
_CONFIG - Tool info file path.
_LOG - Tool log file path.
_LOGO - Logo for splash screen.
_OPS - List of tool options.
_logger - Logger object API.
methods:
__init__ - Initials GenRISCV constructor.
process - Processes and runs operations.
_CONFIG: str = '/conf/gen_riscv.cfg'¶
_GEN_VERBOSE: str = 'GEN_RISCV'¶
_LOG: str = '/log/gen_riscv.log'¶
_LOGO: str = '/conf/gen_riscv.logo'¶
_OPS: List[str] = ['-n', '--name', '-v', '--verbose']¶
process(verbose: bool = False) → bool[source]¶

Processes and runs operations.

Parameters:

verbose (<bool>) – Enable/Disable verbose option

Returns:

True (success operation) | False

Return type:

<bool>

Exceptions:

None
